articles.title: Suspended BJP Leader Nupur Sharma Should "Apologise To Country": Supreme Court
articles.description: Suspended BJP leader Nupur Sharma, whose comments on Prophet Muhammad triggered massive anger among Gulf nations and protests in the country, should apologise to the "whole country", the Supreme Court said today.
articles.content:
Supreme Court said Nupur Sharma is "single-handedly responsible" for what is happening in country. (File)

articles.title: SC was told complaint led to UP demolition; identity of complainants unclear
articles.description: The affidavit included the complaint as an annexure, which identified the complainants as Sarafraj, Noor Alam, Mohammad Azam. The complainants did not mention their address or contact details but described themselves as “respected people of the mohalla”.

articles.title: Shinde new Maharashtra CM, Fadnavis deputy in last-minute twist in script
articles.description: Eknath Shinde became the 20th Chief Minister of the state a day after Shiv Sena chief Uddhav Thackeray resigned as CM ahead of a floor test, bringing to an end the 31-month rule of his Maha Vikas Aghadi coalition.

articles.title: Waterlogging reported as heavy rain lashes parts of Mumbai; Orange alert issued
articles.description: Trains and bus services in Mumbai were badly hit as heavy rains lashed the city. The IMD has issued an orange alert, while the weather department also issued a yellow alert predicting heavy rains on July 1 and 2.
articles.content: An orange alert has been issued as heavy rain lashes several parts of Mumbai, said the India Meteorological Department (IMD). Train and bus services were badly hit across the city. Water-logging was … [+1726 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus LIVE Highlights: India Logs 18,819 New Covid Cases Today, Active Cases Cross 1 Lakh
articles.description: India recorded 18,819 new coronavirus cases in the last 24 hours, taking the total number of COVID-19 cases to 4,34,52,164. According to the Union Health Ministry data updated today, the active cases rose to 104,555 today.

articles.title: Delhi Police raid Mohammed Zubair’s house in Bengaluru, seize laptop
